column2: "Nkyii so David na dɔm no asafohen no yiyii Asaf
column4: na Jedutun mba no mu hɔn a wɔnsom mfa nsankutsen
column6: na akasamu nhyɛ nkɔm: na hɔn a wɔyɛɛ edwuma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn som tse no hɔn dodow nye yi:"

column2: "Asaf mba mu; Zakur
column6: Asaf ne mba a wɔwɔ Asaf ne nsaano
column7: hɔn a wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ ɔhen no n'aber do."

column2: "Jedutun dze: Jedutun ne mba; Gedalia
column6: beesia; hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔn egya Jedutun ne nsamu
column7: wɔdze nsankutsen hyɛɛ nkɔm wɔdze ndaase na ayɛyi maa EWURADZE."

column2: "Heman dze: Heman ne mba; Bukkia
"woyinom nyinara nye Heman ne mba
column4: dɛ ɔmfa Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm mu mma abɛn do. Na Nyankopɔn maa Heman mbabanyin duanan na mbabaa baasa."

column2: "Woyinom nyinara wɔ hɔn egya ne nsamu
column3: wɔ EWURADZE fie adwontow no mu
column6: na nsankutsen som Nyankopɔn fie; Asaf
column8: na Heman wɔwɔ ɔhen no ne nsamu."

column2: "Na wɔnye hɔn nuanom a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn EWURADZE fie adwontow no
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ ho enyansafo no nyinara hɔn dodow yɛ ahaenu eduowɔtwe awɔtwe."

column2: "Na wɔtwee hɔn ɔhwɛdwuma no ho tonto
"Afei kyɛfa a odzi kan a ɔyɛ Asaf dze no bae maa Josef: dza otsia ebien no bae maa Gedalia; ɔno na no nuanom na ne mba wɔyɛ duebien:"
"dza otsia ebiasa no bae maa Zakur
"dza otsia anan no bae maa Izri
"dza otsia enum no bae maa Netania
"dza otsia esia bae maa Bukkia
"dza otsia esuon no bae maa Jesarela
"dza otsia awɔtwe no bae maa Jesaia
"dza otsia akron no bae maa Mattania
"dza otsia du no bae maa Simei
"dza otsia dubiako no bae maa Azarel
"dza otsia duebien no bae maa Hasabia
"dza otsia duebiasa no bae maa Subael
"dza otsia duanan no bae maa Mattitia
"dza otsia duenum no bae maa Jeremot
"dza otsia duesia no bae maa Hanania
"dza otsia duesuon no bae maa Josbekasa
"dza otsia duawɔtwe no bae maa Hanani
column3: ne mba na no nuanom duebien:"

column2: "dza otsia duakron no bae maa Malloti
"dza otsia eduonu no bae maa Eliata
"dza otsia eduonu biako no bae maa Hotir
"dza otsia eduonu ebien no bae maa Giddalti
column3: ne mba na no nuanom duebien:"

column2: "dza otsia eduonu ebiasa no bae maa Mahaziot
"na dza otsia eduonu anan no bae maa Romamti-ezer
